00018    Grid::Grid()
00019     : dimensions_(0),
00020       offsets_(0),
00021       size_(0)
00022    {
00023       IntVector dimensions(1);
00024       setDimensions(dimensions); 
00025    }
00026 
00027    Grid::Grid(const IntVector& dimensions)
00028     : dimensions_(0),
00029       offsets_(0),
00030       size_(0)
00031    {
00032       setDimensions(dimensions); 
00033    }
00034 
00035    void Grid::setDimensions(const IntVector& dimensions)
00036    { 
00037       int i;
00038       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00039          if (dimensions[i] <= 0) {
00040             UTIL_THROW("Grid dimensions must be positive");
00041          }
00042       }
00043  
00044       dimensions_ = dimensions;
00045       offsets_[Dimension -1] = 1;
00046       for (i = Dimension - 1; i > 0; --i) {
00047          offsets_[i-1] = offsets_[i]*dimensions_[i];
00048       }
00049       size_ = offsets_[0]*dimensions_[0];
00050    }
00051 
00052    int Grid::rank(const IntVector& position) const
00053    {
00054       int i;
00055       int result = 0;
00056       for (i = 0; i < Dimension - 1; ++i) {
00057          assert(position[i] >= 0);
00058          assert(position[i] < dimensions_[i]);
00059          result += position[i]*offsets_[i]; 
00060       }
00061       assert(position[i] >= 0);
00062       assert(position[i] < dimensions_[i]);
00063       result += position[i];
00064       return result;
00065    }
00066 
00067    IntVector Grid::position(int id) const
00068    {
00069       IntVector position;
00070       int       remainder = id;
00071 
00072       int i;
00073       for (i = 0; i < Dimension - 1; ++i) {
00074          position[i] = remainder/offsets_[i]; 
00075          remainder -= position[i]*offsets_[i]; 
00076       }
00077       position[i] = remainder;
00078       return position;
00079    }
00080 
00081    bool Grid::isInGrid(int coordinate, int i) const
00082    {
00083       bool result = true;
00084       if (coordinate <  0) 
00085          result = false;
00086       if (coordinate >= dimensions_[i]) 
00087          result = false;
00088       return result;
00089    }
00090 
00091    bool Grid::isInGrid(IntVector& position) const
00092    {
00093       bool result = true;
00094       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00095          if (position[i] <  0) 
00096             result = false;
00097          if (position[i] >= dimensions_[i]) 
00098             result = false;
00099       }
00100       return result;
00101    }
00102 
00103    int Grid::shift(int& coordinate, int i) const
00104    {
00105       int shift;
00106       if (coordinate >= 0) {
00107          shift = coordinate/dimensions_[i]; 
00108       } else {
00109          shift = -1 + ((coordinate+1)/dimensions_[i]);
00110       }
00111       coordinate -= shift*dimensions_[i];
00112       return shift;
00113    }
00114 
00115    IntVector Grid::shift(IntVector& position) const
00116    {
00117       IntVector shifts;
00118       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00119          shifts[i] = shift(position[i], i);
00120       }
00121       return shifts;
00122    }
